```{r}
majors <- c("經濟學系","經濟學系","社會學系","社工系","經濟學系")
names <- c("小英", "小美", "大雄","阿華", "阿尼")
gender <- c("F","F","M","F","M")

econOnly <- c(T,T,F,F,T) 
names[econOnly]
gender[econOnly] 

econFemaleOnly<-c(T,T,F)
gender[econOnly][econFemaleOnly]
names[econOnly][econFemaleOnly]
```


```{r}
a <- c("1","b","TRUE")
a[[2]] <- "c" # 元素存在: 替換
a[[4]] <- "7" # 元素不存在： 增加
a[c(5,6)] <- c("J", "K")
a[[7]]<-"Johnson"
```
